If you jump onto the [NA boards](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/) and click on the "[Patch 9.20 Notes](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/e3Qq0YxJ-patch-920-notes)" thread under "announcements" it seems to work fine.

true. now watch the ezreal and kai sa mains shit their pants

As a garen player i feel like some of the changes are fine, the QoL on his q, passive early and R are fine and i agree with it but why does garen e scale with attack speed. with some quick math and a sample build of the 3 zeal items he can get, an I.E and tri-force with berserker's at lvl 18 he is getting almost double the spins he use to get at lvl 18 with them dealing some true dmg and more dmg per spin.  Also the W change is a bit interesting and i am fine to go and test it out that is if he was not currently in a pick/ban sort of state.  It just feels like not garen has shifted for a tanky option top lane to more of a bot lane pick to counter champs that need to win their lane.  He was also the champion that I learned top lane with and would at least once a patch go back to and make sure i still know the basic top lane mechanics and am able to have a good champion to practice and improve them with and feel like that has been taken away from him.  His e stacking conq. is fine but with close to 20 per cast it feels like it is the only viable option right now.  Running him with Grasp and Phase Rush work fine for basically every match-up in the game and he was fine in the top lane without any need to take conq. like the other juggernauts.  His health regen on his passive post lvl 11 also feels quite week.  While the amount of health regen'ed scales per level now having it kick in after a few seconds out of combat about when a warmogs would helped him either get some health back after being chuncked in a team fight or get some health back after full pushing side lanes or taking towers then rotating to the team to help with an objective or a team fight that is about to happen somewhere else on the map.
